description.narrative: The most significant expected project-level impact is derived from the expansion of access to finance for SMEs, including women owned SMEs and SMEs making climate related investments in 10 IDA and/or FCS countries. Increased access to finance for these underserved segments is expected to have positive economic and job creation impacts. Beyond the project, the main source of expected market impact is derived from the promotion of inclusiveness via the demonstration and capacity building channels.
